text.section: On or before the first Monday of June and the first Monday of December of each year, each clerk shall submit to the Comptroller, under oath, a list and account of licenses issued by the clerk.

If a clerk fails to comply with this section, the Comptroller shall:
charge the clerk, at the rates set by law, with the whole amount of blank licenses delivered to the clerk; and
immediately bring suit against the official bond of the clerk to recover that amount.
